1) Extract openssl-1.0.1p.tar.gz to "c:\"
2) Install Perl
3) Open MS VS Command Prompt and do the next:
	cd c:\openssl-1.0.1p

	- For Debug build:
		perl Configure VC-WIN32 --prefix=C:\openssl_debug
		ms\do_ms
		Open ms/nt.mak and replase all "/Zi" entries to "/Z7". There is should be 3 replacements.
	- For Release build:
		perl Configure VC-WIN32 --prefix=C:\openssl_release
		ms\do_ms
		
	nmake -f ms\nt.mak 
	nmake -f ms\nt.mak install

Binaries and insludes will be in C:\openssl_debug and C:\openssl_release folders
